name: Pro/ENGINEER Neutral File
summary: Learn about .NEU files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NEU files can be converted into other common CAD program formats, including .STEP, .IGES, .DXF, and .DWG.

description: File created by Pro/ENGINEER, a program used for 3D product design; contains part information, including geometry, layering, appearance, parameter data, materials, and other design information; stores parts in a neutral format so they can be imported into other CAD programs.
